We found two of the eight missing artifacts outside the museum between a government building that got burned and the gift shop. We are continuing the search and will find more, Zahi Hawass told Reuters. secretary under George W. Bush Donald Rumsfeld issued thousands of memos,`` snowflakes,'' they were called. He reads from some issued in 2003 and in 2005:`` Are we winning or losing the war on terror?'' Is the US government changing fast enough? `` Do we need more troops? During the 2008 presidential campaign, Barack Obama was critical of indefinite detention for unlawful combatants. He was critical of military commissions, he said.`` And here we are... two-plus years later, and all of those things are there.
